title: Lagging after download
body: This is sucks. Im so excited to play League of legends but the ping is 230-250ms. I try every solution in this forum but it cant fix. :(

replies.body: You're playing from pretty far away, so you could certainly run into some higher ping issues.  Our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide might be able to help improve how you route to the game server, but only slightly.  Troubleshooting performed won't be able to exceed that physical distance.  Aside from playing on a closer region, I hope that can help!
I originally from philippines and I download NA server to hone my skills
